name: Vietnamweather
0:
”Alexa, open my weather”
”Alexa, tell my weather update location”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my weather
des:
Weather in Vietnam by Vietnamese

+ Full 63 cities/provinces
+ Need permissions: Device Address (Country & Postal Code Only)


Weather information using Accuweather data and FPT Text to speech api, update every 15 minutes.

Dan Nguyen - Alexa Echo Viet Nam Group.
